messages.startupErr: An error occurred while starting PurpleWave.
messages.jreNotFoundErr: Failed to find PurpleWave's Java Runtime Environment.
messages.jreVersionErr: The version of Java Runtime Environment being used to run PurpleWave is incorrect, or the operating system may be 32-bit.
messages.launcherErr: The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted.
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg:
An instance of PurpleWave is already running. Only one copy can run at a time.
If PurpleWave is not joining games, consider killing the current instance via Task Manager.
